mapper.select: select nvl(cuso_branch,'total') as cusoBranch, nvl(substr(cuso_order_date,4,2),'total') as orderMonth, sum(cuso_total_cost) as totalCost from cusorder where cuso_order_state=2 and substr(cuso_order_date,1,2)=to_char(sysdate,'yy') group by cube (cuso_branch, substr(cuso_order_date,4,2))

select cuso_branch as cusoBranch, sum(cuso_total_cost) as totalCost from cusorder where cuso_order_state=2 and substr(cuso_order_date,1,2)=to_char(sysdate,'yy') and substr(cuso_order_date,4,2)=#{orderMonth} group by cuso_branch order by totalCost desc, cusoBranch
select mgr_name as mgrName from manager where mgr_name like '%'||#{cusoBranch}||'%' or mgr_addr like '%'||#{cusoBranch}||'%' order by mgr_name
